title: Metro Area Apartment
description: Metro area apartment on the third floor. Recently went through a complete renovation and has all new appliances.

title: Downtown Apartment Suite
description: Located near Ballpark Village, this 18th floor, top level apartment is near your favorite baseball team. Great new interior and a stellar view from the patio.

title: The Minimalist
description: A samller loft style apartment, there is one bedroom, a small living room, and a minimal sized kitchen.
